com.nutiteq.datasources.vector

Class CartoDbDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.AbstractVectorDataSource<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry>
      • com.nutiteq.datasources.vector.CartoDbDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.VectorDataSource<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditableCartoDbDataSource

    public abstract class CartoDbDataSource
extends com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.AbstractVectorDataSource<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry>
    Abstract data source for online CartoDB geometry. Instances need to define factory methods for creating style sets based on element metadata.
    Author:
    mark

    • Constructor Detail

      • CartoDbDataSource

        public CartoDbDataSource(com.nutiteq.projections.Projection projection,
                 String account,
                 String sql)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        projection - projection for the data source (almost always EPSG3857)
        account - CartoDB account id
        sql - SQL sentence for loading data. Should contain placeholders (!bbox!, !envelope!) and tags
